problem_names:
lemma AXc:
assumes 
  "c1 \<noteq> c2" and 
  "c1 \<in># X" and
  "c2 \<in># X"
shows "(A1 \<union># ((A2 \<union># (X -# c2)) -# c1)) 
      = (A2 \<union># ((A1 \<union># (X -# c1)) -# c2))"
translations:
